attributes.additional_details: Revoke Gavin Williamson knighthood. This is a huge slap in the face to the British Public. All those children who have been affected from his incompetence during the A-level fiasco. Their futures ruined and unnecessary additional stress put on them over a flawed grading system.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
